name: Candies Sidebar
description: A "candy" Tumblr options menu! Enjoy it as you eat your candies, look at your bunnies and your "waiting to be eaten" candies. Also, if you would like me to change the names, just send me a private message or ask me through my Tumblr!
additional_info:
There is a "Post Archive" because I installed Xkit and I installed the "Post Archive" extension.


Posts - Candies
Followers - Bunnies
Activity - Candy Schedule
Customize - Candy World
Likes - Eaten Before
Following - Bunnies
Spotlight - Top Candies
